spec_data.Name: evolution-ews
spec_data.Description:
This package allows Evolution to interact with Microsoft Exchange servers,
versions 2007 and later, through its Exchange Web Services (EWS) interface.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Mon 09 Oct 2017 07:51:52 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Evolution extension for Exchange Web Services
